root.name: Carnival Games
root.description: Carnival Funfair Games offers 25 mini-games for the whole family to enjoy, in brings an enjoyable day out at the fair into your living room with carnival classics such as Ring Toss, Test Your Strength and Dunk Tank(no actual water involved). Carnival, as with most real life fairs, offers a variety of prizes one might find at gaming booths. Up to 4 person multiplayer is available meaning there can be some friendly competition amongst the family or friends.Games Alley Bowling Ring Toss Shoot a Duck Day at the Races Dunk Tank Test Your Strength Balloon Darts Shooting Gallery Clown Splash Hole in One Hoops Collection Plate The Great Swami Spilled Milk Frog Leap Bowler Coaster Meter O' Love Pigskin Pass Shoot for the Stars Buckets of Fun Going Nuts Prize Claw Nerves of Steel Lucky Cups Push a Prize
